.dre-preview {
  background: #fff; }
  .dre-preview .front {
    margin-top: 15px;
    box-sizing: content-box; }
    @media (min-width: 769px) {
      .dre-preview .front {
        padding: 0 10px; } }
    @media (min-width: 770px) and (max-width: 769px) {
      .dre-preview .front {
        padding: 0 10px; } }
    @media (min-width: 768px) and (max-width: 769px) {
      .dre-preview .front {
        padding: 0 20px; } }
    @media (max-width: 767px) {
      .dre-preview .front {
        padding: 0 1.33333vw; } }

    .theme-ekstrabladet .dre-group--two-columns-half-half-left:after,
    .theme-ekstrabladet .dre-group--two-columns-row-left:after {
      clear: left; } }

    position: relative;
    display: block; }
    .dre-item--video .theme-ekstrabladet .dre-item__asset {
      overflow: hidden; }
    .theme-ekstrabladet .dre-item__asset .dre-item__video {
      position: absolute;
      width: 100%;
      height: 100%;

      background-image: var(--bg-image);
      background-repeat: no-repeat;
      background-size: cover;
      pointer-events: none; }

          background-image: var(--bg-image-md); } }
      @media (max-width: 767px) {
        .theme-ekstrabladet .dre-item__asset .dre-item__video {
          background-image: var(--bg-image-sm); } }
      .theme-ekstrabladet .dre-item__asset .dre-item__video[controls] {
        pointer-events: all; }
      .theme-ekstrabladet .dre-item__asset .dre-item__video[data-fit="crop"] {
        object-fit: cover; }
      .theme-ekstrabladet .dre-item__asset .dre-item__video[data-fit="letterbox"] {
        object-fit: contain; }
    .theme-ekstrabladet .dre-item__asset .dre-item__gif {
      position: absolute;
      width: 100%;
      height: 100%;
      background: #fff;
      text-align: center; }
      .theme-ekstrabladet .dre-item__asset .dre-item__gif img {
        object-fit: contain;
        object-position: center;
        max-width: 100%;
        max-height: 100%; }
  @media (min-width: 770px) {
    .theme-ekstrabladet .dre-item--size-full-image-left,
    .theme-ekstrabladet .dre-item--size-full.dre-item--image-left,

      .theme-ekstrabladet .dre-item--size-full-image-left .dre-item__text,

  @media (max-width: 767px) {
    .theme-ekstrabladet .dre-item--sm-full-image-left .dre-item__asset,
    .theme-ekstrabladet .dre-item--sm-full-image-right .dre-item__asset {
      flex-basis: 33.33333vw; }
    .theme-ekstrabladet .dre-item--sm-full-image-left .dre-item__text,
    .theme-ekstrabladet .dre-item--sm-full-image-right .dre-item__text {
      align-self: stretch; } }
  .theme-ekstrabladet .dre-item--video {
    opacity: 0.9999; }
    .theme-ekstrabladet .dre-item--video .dre-item__asset {
      overflow: hidden; }
    .theme-ekstrabladet .dre-item--video .dre-item__video[data-fit='crop'], .theme-ekstrabladet .dre-item--video .dre-item__video[data-fit='letterbox'] {
      background: #000; }
  .theme-ekstrabladet .dre-item__video {
    height: calc(100% + 0.5px); }
  .theme-ekstrabladet .dre-item__header {
    text-align: center;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    padding: calc(3em / 16);
    color: currentColor;
    display: block; }
    .theme-ekstrabladet .dre-item__header:empty {
      display: none; }
  .theme-ekstrabladet .dre-item--feature-external .dre-item__text::after {
    content: '';
    background: url("https://ekstrabladet.dk/assets/base/svg/external-link-alt-solid.svg");
    background-size: contain;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    position: absolute;
    top: 13px;
    right: 16px;
    height: 16px;
    width: 16px; }
